items.name: CONTROL
desc: the point is a control point, to control the curve from the user interface.

items.name: NORMAL
desc: the text is drawn along the path without scaling.
the point is normal, from the curve discussion view.

items.name: SMOOTH
desc: the point is smooth, the first derivation from the curve discussion view.
With SMOOTH shading, the colors of the lit vertices is interpolated.

items.name: SYMMETRIC
desc: the point is symmetric, the second derivation from the curve discussion view.
